example.text: Going to malls, synagogues, grocery stores, concerts, nightclubs, movie theaters, parades, and elementary schools shouldn't put our lives at risk – but they are in today's America. When will Republicans come to the table and protect us over the NRA? Our lives are at stake. [[url]]

I’m proud to lead the call for more funds for local groups and govts along the CA border with Mexico to ensure we care for asylum seekers in a humane and orderly way, but that doesn't erase the fact that Congress still needs to pass comprehensive and inclusive immigration reform. [[url]]

I’m pushing for additional funds for non-profits and service providers in border communities like San Diego. San Diego has proven that – with adequate resources and strong partnerships on the ground – we can welcome and care for asylum seekers in an orderly and humane way.
Gun violence is different. We know what to do, but Republicans lack the backbone to do it, and, frankly, their justifications why aren't good enough.

Another devastating mass shooting this past weekend – this time killing 8 people at a Texas mall. All this bloodshed and violence won’t stop unless we pass common-sense, popular gun safety legislation to stop it.

It was great to join HASC Chairman Mike Rogers in Morocco, Niger, Benin, and Senegal to strengthen our partnerships and discuss ways to address violent extremism, uphold human rights, and promote good governance. And I loved meeting National Guard troops from San Diego in Niger! [[url]]
